definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Both impetus and dominance are from " Duchayuan " inside which diverge in many items of reform .
sentences.chinese: 改革的動力和主導權均來自於都察院內部。

sentences.english: Already, China and India are jostling for dominance, not least in the Indian Ocean and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 中國和印度在爭奪主導權，尤其是在印度洋和非洲。

definition: ability to have one's say and be listened to/influence/clout
ability to make one's own decisions
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to confuse one thing with another (idiom); to muddle
to counter every move/to be full of tricks
